data.dynamic_settings: Device settings (allow to read & set equipment settings)
data.raw_sensors: Device raw sensors (provide all available by wifi plug sensor fields)
data.direct_request_protocol: Direct data request protocol beta (provide near-realtime direct data reading from equipment, excluding non Axpert devices like Anenji etc.)
